Posts.Content: hi I was diagnosed with TNBC grade 3 on 24th November 2016 had lumptectomy 19 December was told 2weeks later my tumour had a lymph node attached cancerous but lymph nodes removed were clear they sent tumour to leeds for histology testing and I was called in before my appointment to be told I don't have BC after all I have Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma high grade Diffuse large B cell as you can imagine I was shocked confused after pet scan i discovered I have a very rare form of NHL 1% and there's no data or clinical trials due to rareity as anyone else had this happen to them
